intro: This Product User Manual provides comprehensive information about the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) High Resolution Layer (HRL) Croplands product. It details the product characteristics, production methodologies, and workflows involved in the annual provision of HRL Croplands data. The manual also covers product quality, terms of use, and technical support, serving as a primary resource for users seeking to understand and effectively utilise this valuable land monitoring dataset. Detailed methodologies and processing workflows are further elaborated in the Algorithm Theoretical Baseline Document (ATBD).
